about.description1: Front-End Developer with experience in Next.js/React.js. Passionate about crafting unique web interfaces.
about.description2: Specializing in converting Figma designs into high-fidelity code, integrating APIs, and optimizing real-time interactions. Committed to building efficient and high-quality interfaces.

projects.title: Mindara
projects.description: Led Front-End development of Mindara, integrating APIs, managing global state, and developing an AI chat for the platform.

projects.title: Dominique
projects.description: Developed the Dominique web portfolio with WordPress and a custom theme to showcase a professional photographer's work.

projects.title: Love
projects.description: Developed a landing page for Love, featuring a minimalist, clean, and functional style that reflects the brand’s identity.

projects.title: Pokémon Shop
projects.description: Built a store using Pokémon API, implemented pagination, cart, integrated a currency exchange API, and stored data in the browser.

projects.title: Knockout.js Test
projects.description: Developed a mock login, integrated an API to display products, and created a form to add new products using Bootstrap and Knockout.js.

projects.title: Bill Calculator
projects.description: Built an invoice calculator using JavaScript, applying specific rules for accurate calculations and ensuring functionality.

projects.title: Pokédex
projects.description: Built a Pokédex with Pokémon API, implementing pagination and adjusting styles based on Pokémon type, displaying their data.

projects.title: Pokémon TCG
projects.description: Built a TCG card Pokédex with the Pokémon TCG API, implementing pagination and adjusting styles based on card type.

projects.title: Hackers News
projects.description: Replicated Hacker News, consumed its API to display articles, and enabled saving favorites in the browser with local storage.

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: Built a task manager where tasks can be created, edited, deleted, and marked as completed, enabling efficient management.
